title: Job Portal
description: Build a job-portal using react and firebase where people can search for jobs which match their skills, and recruiters can post job openings

title: Face2Face
description: Developed Real-Time Video streaming and chatting Web Application using WebRTC and AgoraSDK facilitating live video interaction

title: Stock Prices
description: This is a project made to use the web to extract the real time value of stocks using web-scraping and with help of libraries such as Beautiful Soup
